sn14.35:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, one who seeks delight in the earth element seeks delight in suffering. One who seeks delight in suffering, I say, is not freed from suffering. One who seeks delight in the water element … in the heat element … in the air element seeks delight in suffering. One who seeks delight in suffering, I say, is not freed from suffering.sn.ii.75
sn14.35:2: "One who does not seek delight in the earth element … in the air element does not seek delight in suffering. One who does not seek delight in suffering, I say, is freed from suffering."
